pullRequest.title: CAMEL-14805: Component - Use doInit for wiring instead of doStart
pullRequest.bodyText:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/CAMEL-14805

camel-bean
camel-dataformat
camel-dozer
camel-file
camel-sql
camel-stream
camel-timer
camel-xslt

nodes.bodyText: We cannot do init here as createXsltBuilder is potentially loading resources from file system and that should be done in doStart. Loading exclusively from classpath is okay in doInit. But file system should be in doStart.
charsets are potentially not available if native compiling, so we may consider to make this doStart. However there are ways to make native compilation include all charsets.
This should be doStart as SqlHelper.resolveQuery can potentially load the SQL template from file system. See the SQL docs
This should be doStart as SqlHelper.resolveQuery can potentially load the SQL template from file system. See the SQL docs
This should be doStart as SqlHelper.resolveQuery can potentially load the SQL template from file system. See the SQL docs

CAMEL-14805: Component - Use doInit for wiring instead of doStart

    * camel-dozer
    * camel-file
    * camel-sql
    * camel-stream
    * camel-timer
    * camel-xslt
CAMEL-14805: Component - load classpath resource in doInit otherwise in doStart
